thread.title: BUZZY TESON

author: BUZZY TESON
title: BUZZY TESON
text:
We just started using the XKGlow highway bar lights here at JJ's Cycle in Watervliet NY. We were so impressed with the quality, workmanship and functionality of this product that we ordered two more sets. These sets were installed and out of our shop within a week.
We were also impressed with quality and ease of installation. I put a short commercial on the JJ's Cycle facebook page showing how they worked and within one day I had to order 3 more sets.
I'm looking forward to a very active relationship with XKGlow products.
